author: Nick Timiraos
title: Fed Officials Marked Up Growth, Inflation Outlook in January - WSJ
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Federal Reserve officials agreed last month that a strengthening economic growth outlook bolstered their plans to keep raising short-term interest rates this year.
Fed officials late last month believed the economy was set to grow faster than they when they met in December, according to minutes of their Jan. 30-31 meeting, which were released on Wednesday.
